00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 
00032 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00033   * @{
00034   */
00035 
00036 /** @addtogroup QSPI_Examples QSPI
00037   * @{
00038   */
00039 
00040 /** @addtogroup Flash_Quad_Mode
00041   * @{
00042   */
00043 
00044 
00045 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 #define FLASH_TEST_SIZE                           (256)       // Shall be less or equal to the sector size
00047                                                               // (erase size in one time)
00048 #define FLASH_TEST_ADDR                           (0x100000)
00049 
00050 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 void Flash_Test(void);
00052 void Flash_Verify(void);
00053 void Flash_BlankCheck(void);
00054 
00055 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00056 vu32 gFLASH_ID = 0;
00057 u8 gWrite_Buffer[FLASH_TEST_SIZE];
00058 __ALIGN4 u8 gRead_Buffer[FLASH_TEST_SIZE];
00059 
00060 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00061 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00062   * @brief  Main program.
00063   * @retval None
00064   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00065 int main(void)
00066 {
00067   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00068   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00069   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED3);
00070 
00071   Flash_Test();
00072 
00073   while (1)
00074   {
00075   }
00076 }
00077 
00078 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00079   * @brief  SPI Flash Test Function.
00080   * @retval None
00081   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00082 void Flash_Test(void)
00083 {
00084   u8 status;
00085   u32 i;
00086 
00087   /* Prepare test pattern                                                                                   */
00088   for (i = 0; i < FLASH_TEST_SIZE; i++)
00089   {
00090     gWrite_Buffer[i] = i;
00091   }
00092 
00093   /* Initialize the QSPI flash driver                                                                       */
00094   SPI_FLASH_Init();
00095 
00096   /* Read SPI Flash ID                                                                                      */
00097   gFLASH_ID = SPI_FLASH_ReadJEDECID();
00098 
00099   /* Set Status Reg and Configuration Reg                                                                   */
00100   /*  Status Reg       : 0x40, Quad Enable, clear the Block Protection bit                                  */
00101   /*  Configuration Reg: 0x00                                                                               */
00102   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00103      The output driver strength (ODS) can be adjusted in the Configuration Register depending on the
00104      Flash model.
00105   */
00106   status = SPI_FLASH_WriteStatus2(0x40, 0x00);
00107   if ((status & 0x40) == 0) // Check the Quad Enable success
00108   {
00109     while (1); /* Should not reach here, which means the Serial Flash does not support Quad Enable (QE) bit */
00110   }
00111 
00112   HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00113 
00114   /* Sector Erase                                                                                           */
00115   SPI_FLASH_SectorErase(FLASH_TEST_ADDR);
00116 
00117   /* Quad Write and Read (for verify)                                                                       */
00118   QSPI_FLASH_BufferWrite(gWrite_Buffer, FLASH_TEST_ADDR, FLASH_TEST_SIZE);
00119   QSPI_FLASH_BufferQuadRead((u16*)gRead_Buffer, FLASH_TEST_ADDR, FLASH_TEST_SIZE/2);
00120   Flash_Verify();
00121 
00122   /* Sector Erase                                                                                           */
00123   SPI_FLASH_SectorErase(FLASH_TEST_ADDR);
00124 
00125   /* Read and Blank check                                                                                   */
00126   QSPI_FLASH_BufferQuadRead((u16*)gRead_Buffer, FLASH_TEST_ADDR, FLASH_TEST_SIZE/2);
00127   Flash_BlankCheck();
00128 }
00129 
00130 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00131   * @brief  Verify by compare the read buffer with write buffer, turn on LED2 if success.
00132   * @retval None
00133   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00134 void Flash_Verify(void)
00135 {
00136   u32 i;
00137   u32 err = 0;
00138 
00139   /* Check the data of read/write buffer are the same                                                       */
00140   for (i = 0; i < FLASH_TEST_SIZE; i++)
00141   {
00142     if (gRead_Buffer[i] != gWrite_Buffer[i])
00143     {
00144       err++;
00145     }
00146   }
00147 
00148   if (err == 0)
00149   {
00150     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED2);
00151   }
00152 }
00153 
00154 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00155   * @brief  Blank check by confirm the read buffer, turn on LED3 if success.
00156   * @retval None
00157   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00158 void Flash_BlankCheck(void)
00159 {
00160   u32 i;
00161   u32 err = 0;
00162 
00163   /* Confirm the data of read buffer are all 0xFF                                                           */
00164   for (i = 0; i < FLASH_TEST_SIZE; i++)
00165   {
00166     if (gRead_Buffer[i] != 0xFF)
00167     {
00168       err++;
00169     }
00170   }
00171 
00172   if (err == 0)
00173   {
00174     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED3);
00175   }
00176 }
00177 
00178 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)

00184   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00185 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00186 {
00187   /*
00188      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00189      Debug message can be added here.
00190      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00191   */
00192 
00193   while (1)
00194   {
00195   }
00196 }
00197 #endif
